name: invalid-port
errMessage: schema violation (port: value should be between 0 and 65535)

name: negative-port
errMessage: schema violation (port: value should be between 0 and 65535)

name: special-chars
desc: Tags and path with special characters
errMessage: schema violation (path: invalid path: '/@#$%^&*()' (characters outside of the reserved list of RFC 3986 found))

name: invalid-ca-and-cert
desc: Create http service with invalid ca and cert
errMessage: 2 schema violations (ca_certificates.1: expected a valid UUID; client_certificate.id: expected a valid UUID)

name: invalid-retries
desc: Attempt to create service with negative retries
errMessage: schema violation (retries: value should be between 0 and 32767)

name: invalid-connecttimeout
desc: Attempt to create service with non-numeric timeout
errMessage: schema violation (connect_timeout: value should be between 1 and 2147483646)

name: invalid-readtimeout
desc: Attempt to create service with non-numeric timeout
errMessage: schema violation (read_timeout: value should be between 1 and 2147483646)

name: invalid-writetimeout
desc: Attempt to create service with non-numeric timeout
errMessage: schema violation (write_timeout: value should be between 1 and 2147483646)

name: non-exist-ca
desc: Create http service with not existing certificate
errMessage: does not reference an existing 'certificates' entity.
